title.en: Binbou Kishi ni Yomeiri Shita Hazu ga!? Yajin Reijou wa Koutaishihi ni Natte mo Ryuu wo Karitai

altTitles.ja: 貧乏騎士に嫁入りしたはずが！？ 野人令嬢は皇太子妃になっても竜を狩りたい（コミック）

altTitles.en: She Was Supposed to Marry a Poor Knight!? The Wild Lady Wants to Hunt Dragons Even After Becoming the Crown Princess

description.en:
The esteemed daughter of the Caliente Marquis family, Ralphine, grew up almost unconnected to noble life as a tomboy with an outstanding athletic ability.  She was raised almost like a commoner away from the capital as raising a noble daughter is quite expensive and her parents already had her 5 brothers and 5 sisters to provide for. 

Ral became a great huntress, able to take out even a red bear, and earned the nickname "wild daughter" from the village children. Right before her 13th birthday, her poor but loving parents take her to the capital for her coming-of-age ceremony and introduction to aristocratic society. 

There, she befriends the Imperial Palace Knight, Selmianne, who turns out to actually be a hidden child of the current emperor!?
description.ja: ワケあって田舎の領地で育った侯爵令嬢・ラルフシーヌは、ずば抜けた運動能力と負けず嫌いな性格で村のガキ大将として名を轟かす「野人令嬢」である。帝宮での式典で暴れ周ったことをきっかけに騎士・セルミアーネに見初められ嫁入りするが、貧乏騎士だったはずの彼は、実は現皇帝の隠し子で―!?
